values.value: ID, Name, DDD Outlet_ID,Account Owner,Owner_Role,Outlet Name,Account Name,Parent Account,Address,City,State,Zip,Last Inperson Activity Date,Last Non-Personal Activity Date,Last Non-personal activity (email;phone call;voicemail),Days since Last in-person visit

SELECT WhatId, ActivityDate, type, DaysSinceLastActivityDate__c FROM Event where WhatId!='' and What.Type='Sales_Planner__c' and (ActivityDate=THIS_YEAR or ActivityDate=LAST_N_DAYS:180) order by WhatId asc, ActivityDate desc
SELECT count() FROM Sales_Planner__c where Account_Owner_ID__c in (##USERIDS##) and Account_Owner_Manager_ID__c!=null

SELECT Id, Name, DDD_Outlet_ID__c, Outlet_Name__c, Owner_Role__c, Account_Name__c, Parent_Account__c, Street2__c, City2__c, State_Province2__c, Zip_Postal_Code2__c, Account_Owner_ID__c, Account_Owner_Manager_ID__c,Untouched_Days__c FROM Sales_Planner__c where Account_Owner_ID__c in (##USERIDS##) and Account_Owner_Manager_ID__c!=null order by Account_Owner_Manager_ID__c asc, Account_Owner_ID__c asc, Untouched_Days__c asc

SELECT WhatId, ActivityDate, type, DaysSinceLastActivityDate__c FROM Task where WhatId!='' and What.Type='Sales_Planner__c' and (ActivityDate=THIS_YEAR or ActivityDate=LAST_N_DAYS:180) order by WhatId asc, ActivityDate desc
Select Id, Name, email, Manager.Id, Manager.Name,Manager.email from User where profileid ='00e61000000cYcvAAE' and IsActive=true order by Manager.ID asc
